guide.introduction: Build the most unique clock on the market, featuring a retro Russian display tube and a clear plastic case so you can appreciate the inner workings of this fantastic gadget!
guide.introduction_rendered:
Build the most unique clock on the market, featuring a retro Russian display tube and a clear plastic case so you can appreciate the inner workings of this fantastic gadget!

Relevant parts
  • Icetube Clock kit (includes all parts needed)
  • IV-18 vacuum fluorescent display (VFD) tube
  • ATmega168V-10PU Microcontroller
  • VFD driver in PLCC-28 package
  • 7805 Voltage Regulator
  • 32.768 KHz, 12.5 pF watch crystal
  • N-Channel HEXFET
  • P-channel MOSFET
  • 60V breakdown Schottky Diode
  • 60V zener diode
  • 200mA fuse
  • 2200uH power inductor, >0.2A current capability
  • 1/4W 5% 10K resistor
  • 1/4W 5% 270K resistor
  • 1/4W 5% 100K resistor
  • 1/4W 5% 22 resistor
  • 20pF ceramic capacitor
  • 0.1uF ceramic capacitor (104)
  • 0.1uF ceramic capacitor 100V
  • 22uF / 100V Electrolytic Capacitor
  • 47uF / 25V Electrolytic Capacitor
  • 220uF/6.3V capacitor
  • 2.1mm Power Jack
  • 28-PLCC socket
  • 28-pin socket
  • 6 pin header, 0.1"x0.1" spacing
  • Right angle SPDT switch
  • Right angle tactile switch
  • 2x10 position 0.1" x 0.1" female header
  • 2x10 position 0.1" x 0.1" right angle header
  • Piezo Speaker
  • 12mm 3V lithium coin cell
  • 12mm Coin Cell Holder
  • Adafrut Circuit Boards
